results.title: Effect of Costus pictus per se and in combination with Metformin and Enalapril in streptozotocin induced diabetic nephropathy in rats.
results.text_hl: Histopathological evaluation revealed that combination therapy reduced the @<m>DISEASE_Vacuolar_myopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536522 @@@vacuolar degeneration of tubules@@@.

citations.NLM: Sanaye M, Sathyapal G, Kulkarni YA. Effect of Costus pictus per se and in combination with Metformin and Enalapril in streptozotocin induced diabetic nephropathy in rats. J Diabetes Metab Disord. 2022 Dec;21(2):1349-1358. PMID: 36404856
